recipeBook.title: Grilled Cheese
recipeBook.shortDescription: The best things to accompany tomato soup
instructions: put butter on pan until melted
make and sandwhich with cheese and bread

take the sandwich out of the pan and put more butter in the pan
put sandwich back in the pan with the uncooked side face down.
